q: Reflecting on the Arizona shootings that killed six people and badly wounded Rep. Gabrielle Giffords , Colin Powell said he was dismayed by the harsh tenor of political debate that some have said may have contributed to the attack. There has crept in our society and our public dialogue, a coarseness, a nastiness, an attack of people who don't share the same views as you do, he said.`` All sorts of nastiness. I've heard gunshots and struggles outside. All the men on our street are armed to protect their homes. Neither my husband nor other men here have slept. Also, there are prisoners on the loose which is a big issue. People have not been able to go out to work. The well-off are OK as they have stored food. But the poor are really suffering- they are starving. Mosa'ab Elshamy tweets:`` Mixed feelings towards Arab League Colin Powell Secretary, Amr Moussa . We found two of the eight missing artifacts outside the museum between a government building that got burned and the gift shop. We are continuing the search and will find more, Zahi Hawass told Reuters. While Mr. David Cameron was quick to issue a statement supporting Mr. Andy Coulson Friday, arguing that his ex-aide has been punished twice for the same offence, the tabloid scandal has tainted his government with two less than desirable associations.
